price: Na tukawaingiza katika rehema yetu. Hakika wao walikuwa katika watu wema.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: Na tukawajaalia miongoni mwa watu wa kupata rehema yetu. Hakika hao ni katika waja wetu wema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā innahum mina al-ṣāliḥīna
